TopicTitle: Looking for working Stock Space Shuttle

Articles.Content:
I tried to create smoothing on my own but i just can't do this is to difficult.

I wonder does anyone created shuttle using stock parts. I once have Tiberdine Shuttle but it's mode shuttle i looking for something working from defaults parts.
one of the devs did, it has working doors and everything! it's awesome

I tried to create smoothing on my own but i just can't do this is to difficult.

I wonder does anyone created shuttle using stock parts. I once have Tiberdine Shuttle but it's mode shuttle i looking for something working from defaults parts.

Not possible now. You can easily create something that looks like a shuttle but you wont have working bay doors.

Pawelk, I have made a stock Space Shuttle that you may have an interest in.

It preforms LKO crew transfers exceptionally well with proper handling, but sadly lacks the capability of performing cargo missions. I was working on creating a cargo bay capable Shuttle based off of concepts provided by Sgt_Flyer. However, the cargo version I was so arduously working on does not function in 0.21 due to the removal of strut elasticity. I have no clue if the Shuttle works in 0.21 because my main hard drive has been out of commission for the last month.

Here I leave the link for anyone's potential enjoyment.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/36120-Space-Shuttle-Atlantis
